alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 3:53AM PST until December 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult due to slippery or snow packed roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will likely impact travel through Westgard Pass at times this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
